definition: Sun Jihai (1977-), Chinese footballer, played for Manchester City (2002-2008)
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Such being the case, Sun Jihai's main force status is certainly unshakeable .
sentences.chinese: 既然如此，孫繼海的主力地位當然不可動搖。

sentences.english: Li Tie and Snu Jihai are Chinese international football players.
sentences.chinese: 李鐵和孫繼海使中國的國際足球運動員。
